description:
{{nihongo|'''Eiko Kawashima'''|川島 栄子|Kawashima Eiko|born 31 August 1961}}, better known as {{nihongo|'''Anri'''|杏里|}}, is a Japanese singer-songwriter from [[Yamato, Kanagawa|Yamato]], [[Kanagawa Prefecture]]. In a career spanning more than 40 years, she achieved commercial success and popularity in the [[city pop]] music scene during the 1980s.

She currently lives in Los Angeles.
